settings.title: New Scheduler
settings.name: Scheduler name:
settings.time_help: The time (HH:mm) to execute the scheduler. HH='*' any hour, mm='*' any minute
settings.crontime_help: The cron time to execute the scheduler. See http://crontab.guru/ for more information.
settings.runonce_help: Stop the scheduler after first execution.
settings.repetition_help: The days of the week to repeat the scheduler. If no days selected, the scheduler is disabled.

error.crontime_invalid: Enter a valid cron time pattern. See http://crontab.guru/ for more information.
error.timezone_invalid: Enter Timezone as Europe/Helsinki, Pacific/Honolulu, UTC, EET, Etc/GMT+3, etc.
